TopicTitle: Telemachus and setting up another display.

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I'm here obviously for some help and hoping to get some!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24594-0-21-Telemachus-%E2%80%93-Telemetry-and-Flight-Control-in-the-Web-Browser

This mod has been in my eye for a while now but I have a few questions...

I don't have a 2nd monitor so could I use my flat screen TV to hook up to my laptop via HDMI to show only one of the graphs?

If not, could I use an old 2nd generator Ipod I have laying around? It can't connect to the internet but the laptop can.

I can't afford another monitor at the moment so that is not really an option, thanks in advance!

The other monitor does not need to be connected to the machine you are playing KSP with. As long as you can open a web browser on a device with a screen, you can use it. It just has to be on the same subnet as you KSP machine. You would find out what your KSP machine's local IP address is, and visit http://192.168.???.???:8080 on your ipod or your tv or whatever you got.
